title: Blissful Greek Island Escape with Nightly Dinner
description: Discover the beauty of the magical Greek island of Zakynthos (also known as Zante) with a stay at Contessina Hotel, perched 100 metres from the beach in the quaint village of Tsilivi. Unwind in tranquillity at this ultra-stylish retreat and indulge in daily buffet breakfast, nightly à la carte dinner, a welcome drink and local sweets on arrival and a 10% discount on dining and drinks.

title: Adults-Only Greek Island Pool Suites with Guaranteed Sea Views & Daily Lunch or Dinner
description:
Experience the epitome of Greek luxury at this haven of tranquillity set on the picturesque island of Zakynthos. This stunning adults-only property offers guests a taste of the Mediterranean lifestyle with spacious suites boasting a private pool and terrace, bohemian decor and breathtaking views of the Ionian Sea.

This Greek paradise is a picture-perfect setting to begin your fairy tale holiday. Venture out to hidden coves, historical villages and the renowned Shipwreck Beach. 

Savour traditional Greek cuisine at Noya Restaurant, or sip cocktails by your private pool and soak up the serene surroundings. 

Once you've finished exploring, retreat to the refined ensuite and experience pure relaxation in the calm waters of the rain shower.

title: Exclusive Adults-Only Island Escape with Luxurious Dining and Transfers
description: Discover the magical Greek island of Zakynthos with a stay at the five-star Contessina Suites and Spa, perched 100 metres from the beach in the quaint village of Tsilivi. Unwind in exclusive tranquillity and romantic seclusion and indulge in daily buffet breakfast, nightly a la carte dinner, a welcome drink and local sweet on arrival, private return airport transfers in a luxury vehicle and more.

title: Adults-Only Greek Island Escape with Daily Breakfast & Daily Lunch or Dinner
description:
Experience the epitome of Greek luxury at this haven of tranquillity set on the picturesque island of Zakynthos. This stunning adults-only property offers guests a taste of the Mediterranean lifestyle, with spacious suites, private pools and breathtaking views of the Ionian Sea.

Venture out to explore the island's hidden coves, historic villages and renowned Shipwreck Beach. Savour traditional Greek cuisine at the onsite restaurant - Noya, or sip a cocktail by your private pool as you soak up the serene surroundings. A picture-perfect setting to rekindle love or begin your fairy tale in a dreamy ambience.

title: Opulent Five-Star Greek Island Villa Oasis with Private Beach, Three Restaurants & Rejuvenating Spa
description: An oasis of coastal opulence set on a magical private stretch of beach in one of Zakynthos’ most beautiful secluded bays, Porto Zante Villas & Spa is a stunning sight to behold. Providing five-star elegance around every corner, this boutique luxury resort boasts an array of award-winning private villas, each with unique views of the picturesque Ionian Sea. With modern stylings and supremely comfortable interior and exterior living spaces, unwind in the lush private garden, on the sun deck or in the spacious lounge and dining areas. Dine on your choice of exquisite Greek or tantalizing Asian cuisine at the resort’s restaurant offerings, indulge in a much-needed, rejuvenating massage at the onsite spa and toast to a holiday like no other with a refreshing waterfront cocktail.
